title: Multiple Return Values
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use multiple return values in Go functions, including how to return two input parameters in reverse order and how to accept a variable number of arguments in Go functions.

meta.title: Go Programming | Multiple Return Values | Lab
meta.description: Explore Go's feature of returning multiple values from functions, including how to handle result and error values.
meta.keywords: Go programming, multiple return values, function returns, error handling, idiomatic Go

verify.name: Verify Go Multiple Return Values
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
